name: Tron Hockey
description:
Do you like motorbikes and hockey too? Than this game become one of your favourites.
Score as many goals as you can and share your victory in a multiple mode! What is more you can practice lonely and prepare for the physics-based match.
Choose a remote control motorcycle, and the field which is the best for you and try your skills out. You can use and collect nitro to be the fastest person on the court.
Get the best vehicle and enjoy the experience that the game offers you. Don’t miss it!



The current features include:

  • 4 beautiful and modern motorcycles
  • 6 kinds of courts
  • Training option
  • Available on windows and mac
  • Cross platform multiplayer
  • Shop system
